data.name: MENU_RANDOMIZER_TOP
data.comment: Label of the randomizer option on the title (top) menu.

data.name: MENU_RANDOMIZER_TITLE
data.comment: Title of the Randomizer window when opened.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_SEEDING
data.comment: Label of the seeding menu option, used to control how things randomize.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_CACHING
data.comment: Label of the caching menu option, used to control randomizer optimization.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_POKEMON
data.comment: Label of the Pokemon menu option, containing stat, ability, and evolution randomization.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_ITEMS
data.comment: Label of the Items menu option, containing item stat and appearance randomization.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_MOVES
data.comment: Label of the Moves menu options, controlling Power, AoE, and typing.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_DUNGEONS
data.comment: Label of the Dungeons menu option, controlling dungeon appearance and traits.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_NAMING
data.comment: Label of the Naming menu option, controlling dungeon, item, and Pokemon names.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_MENU_STATUSES
data.comment: Label of the Status Effects menu option.

data.name: RANDOMIZER_CLEAR_FILES
data.value: This will clear every modified file from the randomizer, returning everything to normal.[br]Your current save will likely not play correctly after this.[pause=0] Continue?
data.comment: Label of the Status Effects menu option.

data.name: pmdorand:pkmn.typing.rand.description
data.value: Toggles randomization for Pokemon types.[br]Disable to keep Pokemon types as they should be.

data.name: pmdorand:pkmn.typing.duplicates.description
data.value: Allows a Pokemon's first and second type to be identical.

data.name: pmdorand:pkmn.typing.retainDual.description
data.value: Makes Pokemon keep the same amount of types that they originally had.

data.name: pmdorand:pkmn.typing.retainment.description
data.value: Controls whether a Pokemon's first or second type should be kept during randomization.

data.name: PMDOR_CHANGELOG_2025-03-23
data.value:
Project code is now available on GitHub!
Type randomization for Pokemon has been updated to work with blacklist as well as retaining secondary type and avoiding duplicates. Wahoo! Some type randomization options are also available in the in-game menu.
